author: Markus Spring
content: Certainly not an easy decision - I can feel with you as I still struggle with the images I've got. The image you show here is certainly worth publishing, but without question it needs the proper framework. An external constraint like Sofobomo can be challenging - especially when doing it for the first time - but also enforces compromises that can be inappropriate, like here. So I will stay tuned and wait for the news and new images.
